General FAQ:


How long does it take to setup the VPS?
Setup can take from 1 to 24 hours once payment is completed and verified.

Do you offer Dedicated IP addresses?
Yes, the cost for a dedicated IP address is $1/monthly.

Yes, we can install almost all known control panels for free.

No, make sure you always backup and download your data.
